content: **pattern notes** the last round of motifs is worked using a join-as-you-go method joining as you as you work the final round of most motifs large full and large half motifs are joined to previous ones at chain-2 spaces of fans as shown in the placement chart finally filler motifs are joined as you work their final round to large motifs at chain-2 spaces of fans after all large motifs are joined read all instructions carefully before completing all rounds of motifs as some are joining rounds **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** chain slip_stitch single half double and double_crochet stitches treble and treble_crochet stitches assembling motifs using the join as you go method working in joined rounds **finished measurements ** wingspan 70 depth 40 **hooks & notions ** us size 7 4 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle **materials ** premier® yarns sock kit 50% superwash merino wool 25% bamboo 25% polyamide 1 - 88oz/25g 114yds/105m and 2 - 1 75oz/50g 229yds/210m mc1 and cc1 2154-13 happy hour 2 kits mc2 and cc2 2154-01 it s a mood 1 kit **gauge ** rnds 1-7 of large motif = 10 diameter
